title: Research
description: A Thaumcraft research to add or modify

key.description: The unique key for this research. If this key already exists, the research will be updated

category.description: The category in the Thaumonomicon to place this research

name.description: The localized name of this research

tooltip.description: The localized tooltip of this research

aspects.description: The aspects required for this research. This is used for things like purchasing the research or creating research notes.

parents.description: The parent researches required for this research

siblings.description: The sibling researches for this research

displayColumn.description: The column to display this research in

displayRow.description: The row to display this research in

icon_item.description: The item icon for this research. Mutually exclusive with icon_research.

icon_resource.description: The resource icon for this research. Mutually exclusive with icon_item.

complexity.description: The complexity of this research. Used in creating research notes.

isSpecial.description: Whether this research is "special". Slightly changes the icon of the research. Mutually exclusive with isRound.

isRound.description: Whether this research is round. Changes the icon of the research. Mutually exclusive with isSpecial.

isStub.description: Whether this research is a stub

isVirtual.description: Whether this research is virtual. This will not be displayed in the Thaumonomicon, but can be used as a parent for other researches

isConcealed.description: Whether this research is concealed until parents are completed.

isHidden.description: Whether this research is hidden until parents are completed.

isLost.description: Whether this research is "lost". Seems to have something to do with Eldritch research

isAutoUnlock.description: Whether this research is auto-unlocked on completion of parents

itemTriggers.description: The item triggers for this research

entityTriggers.description: The entity triggers for this research

aspectTriggers.description: The aspect triggers for this research

number.description: The page number. Must start at 0 and increase by 1 for each page

text.description: The text description on the page, if the page type is "text" or "image"

resource.description: The resource of the image shown on the page, if the page type is "image"

item.description: The output of the recipe. Required for page types "arcane", "recipe", "smelting", "crafting", and "infusion"

aspects.description: The aspects of the page. Required for page type "aspect"
